description: Denominators of coefficients in function a(x) such that a(a(a(x))) = sin x.
comments: Also denominators of coefficients in function a(x) such that a(a(a(x))) = sinh x.
references: W. C. Yang, Composition equations, preprint, 1999.
mathematica: n = 13; m = 2 n - 1 (* m = maximal degree *); a[x_] = Sum[c[k] x^k, {k, 1, m, 2}] ; coes = DeleteCases[ CoefficientList[Series[a @ a @ a @ x - Sin[x], {x, 0, m}], x] // Rest , 0]; Do[s[k] = Solve[coes[[1]] == 0] // First; coes = coes /. s[k] // Rest, {k, 1, n}](CoefficientList[a[x] /. Flatten @ Array[s, n], x] // Denominator // Partition[#, 2] &)[[All, 2]](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 04 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 22 2000
